name: Silly Dreams
description:
M.M.I, pt 3: Schizophrenia

"...they keep haunting me in the morning"

Characterized by episodes in which the person is unable to distinguish between real and unreal experiences. For someone with schizophrenia,  the most basic processes of perceiving and thinking are affected by the illness; every person diagnosed with the illness have a unique experience of world.

Museum of Mental Incapabilities is a collection of artworks depicting mental health problems and disorders. Explore and understand what it feels like to live with various mental incapacities.
